English, German and French
To change it edit the evolution.ini
cant create a multiplayer game... game crashes when trying to create... any ideas?
About 95% of all pirated games will not work with multiplayer, you will have to wait and see if a multiplayer crack is released, but don't hold your breath.
vikkinen: oh you cant play multiplayer in a pirated game? I wonder why....

I'm getting a warning with Norton AV that this file is a trojan virus called "ZeroAccess.B." Is it a false positive or is the file corrupted? My AV is up to date and as soon as the setup file was used, I had a warning come up telling me that a virus was in my system.

Just made this account to write a comment. Saw this game on steam, watched a video on youtube and thought it was absolutely amazing looking. Didn't have the money, checked pirate bay yesterday and NOPE, no torrent.

Checked today and there was one. Downloaded- it works. Version 1.03. Not sure if there are any viruses or not, don't take my word for it. Not like I care anyway, I have no important info on my PC

Does anybody know how to solve the problem with everything looking like %canceltitle, %accepttitle, etc.?

I also can't start a new game, it just brings me back to the main menu.
I've got the exact same problem bredrinben...Does anyone have a solution for it?Or we will have to wait for a better release?

Just a note that my virus scanner gave me a false positive during installation, specifically for a file called skinh_el.dll, part of the GUI toolkit used for the installer.

As stated, it's not a trojan/virus, but a false positive.
Hey Guys what the name of the music in setup by Revolt?
I've launched the game, but after this sponsor animations I'm stuck with Endless Space logo. what's wrong?

Song: Deadmau5 - I Remember (Vocal Mix) 
As said, is a false positive.

@ Itchiga

Lmao I thought the same thing.

it's deadmau5 & Kaskade - I Remember (HQ)
Stuck at the game logo. Any one know a solution to this ?

After launching the shortcut, I just get a black screen and my computer stops responding.
Nothing works anymore, even task manager doesn't react even the quick shut down (power button) doesn't work...

Any knows what's going wrong?
bredrinben and ne0lit, to avoid the problem where all text is just placeholder with %%, you have to launch the game with "Run as Administrator".

for the guys with problem with the % and Title things and when you cant start a game just simply move the game folder in other folder like if  it was D:GamesEndless space move it to D:Endless Space it worked for me!

Ok guys little help pls. After instal i try game firt 2 video vorking ok, but after 2 video iceberg play it cool i got screen with the ships and mouse icon change in what i supouse to be mouse icon in the game and nothing, no menu, nothing after that. I try restart comp, vc 2010 instal, removing firewall and nothing helped.

about the %%

putting the folder directly to like D: is not working,
also running as admin is not working

trying to start a game the game crashes

updating dx and stuff didnt work

please help
If your game has stopped on the initial screen, try to uninstall EVERY version of Microsoft Virtual C++ and then install "vcredist_x86.exe" (from 'redist' folder. It should work now (hopefully)
@yoep same problem. Black screen, hard crash, needs a reboot. Tried the C++ redist fix, nothing. wtf.

For all those people who have the %something% problem and cant start the game, don't change folders uninstall and the such , someone said it earlier .. run as admins . I had the same problem and everything works just fine with this

-TO START AND PLAY 'ENDLESS SPACE' YOU NEED A PROGRAM/PLUGINS: * ffdshow * !!!!!
